title: A Shocking New Immigration Proposal By Corrupt Biden (Ep 1812)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning new proposal by the Biden Administration to destroy our borders. 

News Picks:

A shocking new study on masks.


Secret Service on deadline to produce alleged “deleted” texts.

Under new 'online sign-up for asylum,' illegal immigrants could flock to US airports: GOP senator.


More than 2 million illegal border encounters so far in fiscal 2022.


The grotesque treatment of the January 6th detainees is making us look like a third world country.

$3,835,390,000,000: Federal Tax Collections Set Record Through June.

Just FYI, the baby formula shortage is getting worse, not better.

Reddit is full-woke.
